description: This Java class 'CustomFeignErrorDecoder' implements the Feign 'ErrorDecoder' interface to handle custom error responses in a Feign client. It processes HTTP error responses, extracts a custom exception object from the response body using Jackson's ObjectMapper, and logs relevant error messages based on the response status.

classes.name: CustomFeignErrorDecoder
classes.description: Implements a custom error decoder for Feign clients to handle various HTTP error responses and extract detailed exception information from the response body.

methods.name: decode
methods.description: Decodes the Feign response based on HTTP status and returns appropriate exceptions or error objects.

methods.name: extractBankingCoreGlobalException
methods.description: Extracts a 'SimpleBankingGlobalException' object from the Feign response body by reading and deserializing the JSON content.
